cards.name: Light!
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Draw a card.
Increase the damage of all Shadow! in your hand by 8 (11).

cards.name: Shadow!
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Draw a card.
Increase the Block of all Light! in your hand by 7 (10).

cards.name: Thrower
cards.description:
Ethereal. Deal damage equal to the remaining Block at the start of this turn (+2). Exhaust.
(Deals 0 (2) damage.)

cards.name: Glitched
cards.description:
Retain.
Exhaust.
While in your hand, []Upgrade Bag's power is disabled.

cards.name: Centralize
cards.description:
Fetch 2 cards from your draw pile.
gatherer:Once (Twice): Upgrade 2 random cards in hand; Fetched cards get priority.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Flower Whip
cards.description:
Deal 3 (4) (5) (6) damage 2 times.
Can be Upgraded 3 (2) (1) (3 times.)  (more )  (times)times.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Spare Bottle (+) <Norm>
cards.description: Whenever you use a Potion, gain 4 (6) Block and deal 4 (6) damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Acidic Spray
cards.description: Deal 4 (6) damage. Deal 4 (6) damage for each debuff on the target. Apply 1 (2) Weak.

cards.name: Aroma Protection
cards.description:
Gain 12 (16) Block.
Add a Dazed into your discard pile.

cards.name: Bambu Sword
cards.description: Deal 8 (11) damage. Play a []Strike or Defend from your hand with no cost.

cards.name: Careful Strike
cards.description: Deal 11 (15) damage. Put up to 1 card on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Collector's Shot
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 1.5 (2) times the number of gatherer:Unique cards with no duplicates in your deck.

cards.name: Convert
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
If it is Uncommon,
gain 25 Block.
If it is Rare,
gain 35 Block.

cards.name: Drug Power
cards.description: Deal 14 (18) damage. If you used a Potion this turn, gain the effect of the last used Potion.

cards.name: Energy Basket
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) gatherer:Lesser Energy Potions.
Retain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flower Falling
cards.description:
Deal 14 (18) (22) (22) damage.
Exhaust.
Can be Upgraded 3 (2) (1) (Heal)  (more )  (times) (Can)times.

cards.name: Flower Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 (11) (14) (14) Block.
Can be Upgraded 3 (2) (1)  (more )  (times)times.

cards.name: Fragile Hammer
cards.description: Deal 8 (11) damage. Deal 12 (16) damage to a random enemy other than the target.

cards.name: Frenzy
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Apply 2 (3) Vulnerable.
Add a Dazed into your discard pile.

cards.name: Gather Material
cards.description: Put 3 (4) random cards from your draw pile into your hand. Prioritizes cards not already in your hand.

cards.name: Potential Slash
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 8 (14) + half of your missing HP.

cards.name: Quick Synthesis
cards.description:
(Draw 1 card.)
Gain 1 random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Save Valuables
cards.description: Choose up to 3 (5) cards from your discard pile. Shuffle them into your draw pile.

cards.name: Scherry Throw
cards.description:
Deal 3 (6) damage.
Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Snatch
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) Damage.
gatherer:Once (Twice): Gain a random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.

cards.name: Tactical Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw 2 cards. (Gain 2 Strength until end of turn.)

cards.name: Tree Growth
cards.description:
Next turn, gain 5 (7) Block.
Gain 10 (14) Block 2 turns later.

cards.name: Wool Gloves
cards.description:
Gain 8 (11) Block.
gatherer:Once (Twice): Draw 3 cards, then discard 3 cards.

cards.name: Alchemy Trial
cards.description: Whenever you play 10 cards, gain a gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion depending on the 10th card played.

cards.name: Balanced Growth
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain up to 1 (2) Strength or Dexterity until they are equal.

cards.name: Big Pouch
cards.description: Draw 2 (3) Cards. Gain Block equal to the total cost of your cards in hand.

cards.name: Duality (+) <ATK>
cards.description: Deal 18 (22) damage. Retain. When Retained, its tag switches between <ATK> and <DEF>.

cards.name: Duplicator
cards.description:
Gain effects of all your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Echo of Nature
cards.description: Gain 3 (4) Block X times. Deal 4 (6) Damage X times.

cards.name: Enchant
cards.description: Choose a Strike in your hand to give it Cost + 1, Damage + 14 (18) and boosts special effect if it has.

cards.name: Feeling Fine
cards.description: Whenever you use 3 Potions in a turn, remove all of your debuffs.

cards.name: Flower Beam
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) (12) (12) damage to the target, then deal 8 (10) (12) (12) damage to ALL enemies.
Can be Upgraded 3 (2) (1)  (more )  (times)times.

cards.name: Flower Power
cards.description:
Gain 2 Weak~~- , -~~  ~~- Frail,  -~~ and Vulnerable (Frail) (times). At the start of your turn, Draw 2 cards.
Can be Upgraded 3 (2)  (more ) times.

cards.name: Fruit Force
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 15 (20) % of your Max HP.
When obtained, raise your Max HP by 4.

cards.name: Glowing Plant
cards.description:
Scry 4 (6).
When obtained, add a Light! and a Shadow! to your deck.

cards.name: Herbalism
cards.description: Gain [E] for each card in your hand that costs 2 or more.

cards.name: Liquidism
cards.description: Whenever you use a Potion, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity randomly.

cards.name: Mining Strike
cards.description: Deal 10 (13) damage. For every 10 (8) unblocked damage, gain 1 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Misfortune
cards.description: Deal 3 (4) damage. Gain up to 1 (2) gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion (Potions) with debuff effect that the enemy already has.

cards.name: Nutrients
cards.description:
Gain 12 (16) Block.
When obtained, Upgrade ALL your gatherer:Flower cards.

cards.name: Odd Spoils
cards.description: Deal 9 (12) damage. Add 1 (2) random card (cards) not in your deck to your discard pile. It (They) costs (cost) 0 until played.

cards.name: Pollute
cards.description: Next turn, apply 2 (3) Poison, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Polymorphism
cards.description: Deal damage equal to number of other cards in your hand. If they are all gatherer:Unique, gain [E] and draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Recipe Change
cards.description: Choose 1 from ALL gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions. Replace all your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions with it. Exhaust.

cards.name: Recovery Herb
cards.description:
Considered as using a Potion. Heal 10 % of your missing HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rotten Stipe
cards.description:
Deal ? damage.
Apply ?.
(Each Rotten Stipe
has randomly chosen
damage and debuff.)

cards.name: Scent of Rosmari
cards.description: Gain 7 (9) Block. Choose 2 (3) cards to Retain. If they end up discarded, return them to your hand next turn.

cards.name: Scroll Of Wall
cards.description: Unplayable. Use a Potion to Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted (and give 1 Plated Armor).

cards.name: Sealed Bomb
cards.description: Deal 50 (60) damage. While in your hand, using a Potion decreases its cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Smart Maneuver
cards.description: Enemy deals half damage this turn. Gain a gatherer:Lesser Swift Potion. (Retain.)

cards.name: Solidify
cards.description: Repeat until your Sack is full: Spend 5 (4) Block to gain a gatherer:Lesser Block Potion.

cards.name: Transmute
cards.description: Transform a card from your hand. It  (is Upgraded and) costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Upgrade Bag
cards.description: Shuffle (Add) a Glitched (+) in your draw (discard) pile. Your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions are 100% more potent.

cards.name: Uplift
cards.description: Each turn, the first card (2)  (cards) you play that costs (cost) 2 or more has (have) Refund 1.

cards.name: Venom Barrier
cards.description: Gain 10 (14) Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 3 Poison to the attacker.

cards.name: Withering Strike
cards.description: Deal 7 (10) damage. Enemy loses 1 Strength.

cards.name: Black Tea
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Strength.
Lose 1 Dexterity.
Startup: Gain a random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.

cards.name: Bomber Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain a gatherer:LEP. All future gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions become gatherer:LEP and raise all gatherer:LEPs' damage by 1 (2) when used.

cards.name: Bulldoze
cards.description: Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies for every 4 (3) gatherer:Unique cards in your discard pile.

cards.name: Colorful Garden
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block per gatherer:Unique card you played this turn.

cards.name: Cursed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 30 (35) damage.
gatherer:Once (Twice): Enemy loses 15 Strength this turn. When obtained, become Cursed - Normality.

cards.name: Examine
cards.description: Look at the top 3 (5) cards of your draw pile. Play one and discard others.

cards.name: Finishing Strike
cards.description: Deal 12 (16) damage. If the enemy has less HP than you, hit 2 times instead.

cards.name: Flaming Bottle
cards.description: Deal 14 (20) damage. Gain a gatherer:Lesser Fire Potion.

cards.name: Grow Book
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block, or permanently replace this with 1 of 3  (Upgraded) cards from other color.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Heart to Fruit
cards.description:
Deal 17 (22) damage.
If Fatal, raise your Max HP by 3 (4). Exhaust.

cards.name: Lucky Clover
cards.description: Gain 1 Dexterity for each gatherer:Flower cards in your deck.

cards.name: Mind Search
cards.description:
Choose 2 out of 4 gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions to gain with the (great) help of Gatherer's thought.
 (Retain.) Exhaust.

cards.name: Overflowing
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] [E].
 (Energy is conserved for the next turn.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Photoscythe
cards.description: Innate. Upgrade ALL your gatherer:Flower cards for the combat. Deal damage equal to 3 (4) X number of them. Exhaust.

cards.name: Poison Mastery
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Gain a gatherer:Lesser Poison Potion.
Poison damage is increased by 100%.

cards.name: Scroll of Purity
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you use a Potion, draw 1 (2) card (cards) and Exhaust up to 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Stone Fence
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add 1 Thrower (+) to your hand.

relics.name: Alchemy Bag
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain a random gatherer:Lesser Potion.
relics.flavorText: A mysterious bag with the power of recurring potions.

relics.name: Mist Generator
relics.description: The amount of enemy's Poison is not reduced each turn if 8 or less.
relics.flavorText: The mist can be deadly for some creatures.

relics.name: Floral Egg
relics.description: Upon pick up, upgrade ALL your gatherer:Flower cards. Whenever you add a gatherer:Flower card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Eggs like flowers. Or they are eggs like flowers.

relics.name: Flying Fruit
relics.description: When you Exhaust 1/3/6/10 gatherer:Unique cards after picking this up, raise your Max HP by 4.

relics.name: Leftovers
relics.description: Every time you use 4 Potions in a combat, gain a random gatherer:Lesser Potion.
relics.flavorText: How alchemists make new material from leftovers is a mystery.

relics.name: Explorer's Path
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn for the next 3 combats.
You can now see the pick ratio of cards in the reward screen.
Choose the lowest-picked card to gain [E] for 1 more combat.
Synergy: Question Card
relics.flavorText: Sometimes it's worth to explore the worst path.

relics.name: Miracle Bag
relics.description:
Replaces Alchemy Bag.
Upon pickup, gain 1 regular Potion Slot.
At the start of each combat, obtain a rare Potion to your regular Potion Slot.

keywords.name: Alchemy Trial
keywords.description:
Attack - Lesser Fire or Explosive Potion
Skill - Lesser Block or Energy Potion
Power - Lesser Strength or Dexterity Potion
Other - Lesser Weak or Fear Potion

keywords.name: When Stacked
keywords.description: If you play multiple Bomber Forms, damage boost is stacked but you only get 1 LEP per turn.

keywords.name: Card Rarity
keywords.description:
Uncommon = Blue Banner
Rare = Gold Banner

keywords.name: Gatherer:flower
keywords.description: Card containing Flower in its name. It can be upgraded 3 times, where 3rd upgrade is special.

keywords.name: 3rd Upgrade
keywords.description: 3rd Upgrade makes this cost 1 instead of increasing damage.

keywords.name: 3rd Upgrade
keywords.description: 3rd Upgrade makes this cost 0 and heal 4 HP instead of increasing damage.

keywords.name: 3rd Upgrade
keywords.description: 3rd Upgrade makes this cost 0 in addition to removing a debuff.

keywords.name: 3rd Upgrade
keywords.description: 3rd Upgrade makes this cost 0 instead of increasing Block.

keywords.name: 3rd Upgrade
keywords.description: 3rd Upgrade makes this attack 3 times in addition to damage increase.

keywords.name: Glow Power
keywords.description: Boosts the effect of Light! and Shadow.

keywords.name: Ironclad Cards
keywords.description: Choose 1 from Armaments, Havoc or Twin Strike. Feed is added to the list if upgraded.

keywords.name: Silent Cards
keywords.description: Choose 1 from Choke, Well-Laid Plans or Poisoned Stab. Alchemize is added to the list if upgraded.

keywords.name: Defect Cards
keywords.description: Choose 1 from Stack, Steam Barrier or All for one. Seek is added to the list if upgraded.

keywords.name: LEP
keywords.description: Stands for Lesser Explosive Potion, which normally deals 6 damage to all enemies.

keywords.name: Lesser Potion
keywords.description: A "Lesser" version of regular potion which is gained to your Sack.

keywords.name: Lesser Block Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which gains 8 Block when used.

keywords.name: Lesser Energy Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which gives you 1 energy when used.

keywords.name: Lesser Fear Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which applies 2 Vulnerable to an enemy.

keywords.name: Lesser Fire Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which deals 10 damage to an enemy.

keywords.name: Lesser Poison Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which applies 4 Poison to an enemy.

keywords.name: Lesser Swift Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which draws 2 cards when used.

keywords.name: Lesser Weak Potion
keywords.description: A Lesser Potion which applies 2 Weak to an enemy.

keywords.name: Once
keywords.description: Only activates when you play this card first time in the combat.

keywords.name: Twice
keywords.description: Only activates for the first two times you play this card in combat. Becomes Once after one use.

keywords.name: Gatherer:unique
keywords.description: Cards with different name (except for upgrades) are considered unique.

mods.name: The Gatherer
mods.credits:
Rita-Bernstein - Character art, ZHS translation
Jedi - RUS translation
HuginRonin - SPA translation
MappyTheKat - Old character splash art
mods.description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 7 relics.

v1.0.8 (2022-10-23)
- New localization: Spanish(Thanks to HuginRonin)
- Now the border of the following cards will glow if their additional effect will be activated: Drug Power, Finishing Strike, Polymorphism
- Explorer's Path pick ratio data was updated for the Gatherer and the Poker Player. Added pick ratio data for the Dragon Tamer.

v1.0.9 (2023-01-29)
- Fixed a few bugs of the Potion Sack
  - When you use the controller with I, O, P keys mapped, pressing I, O, P keys will now properly change the targeting mode.
  - Pressing I, O, P keys will now make you release holding card and cancel regular potion targeting.
- Added glow to Once/Twice cards: Centralize, Cursed Blade, Snatch, Wool Gloves.


Visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1611788501 for full change notes.
